Title: Vintage Train Pocket Watch Two Tone Embossed  Watch-It Japan Quartz With Chain
Description: Vintage Train Two Tone Silver Gold Tone Metal Embossed Pocket Watch Watch-It Japan Quartz With Chain This lovely vintage Watch-It pocket watch was found at an estate sale. It is silver and gold embossed and has a gold train on a railroad track with ornate silver flowers and leaves around the front and an ornate flower design on the back. The watch inside has a silver face with easy to read analog numbers. The pocket watch measures approximately 2.69" long x 1.80" in diameter x .58" thick. The chain measures approximately 15 1/2" long and clips on and is removable. It has Japan Quartz movement. It does have a new battery in it and is running. Please note that on the inside behind the top lid there is a little discoloration (please see last photo) but this may come off if you polish it. I have not cleaned this piece to preserve its vintage state. It is still in great vintage condition. It would make a great gift for someone special. Please note that most of my jewelry comes from estate sales and could need cleaning and since it is vintage some wear is normal.
